name: Angular Blue Socks
description: These socks have better dependency injection than your last project. Two-way data binding for your feet!

name: AngularJS Black Socks
description: Legacy support for your feet! Perfect for when you miss $scope and digest cycles.

name: Arch Linux Socks
description: For developers who compile their own morning coffee. Comes with a built-in superiority complex.

name: AWS Socks (Ecstasy Edition)
description: Guaranteed to reduce cold starts—on your feet, not your Lambda. S3 stands for 'Super Soft Socks'.

name: AWS Socks (Tulip Tree Edition)
description: Multi-region, highly available, and just as overpriced as the real thing. Bill your feet to the cloud.

name: Azure Socks
description: For when you want Microsoft to hug your feet. Comes with free downtime (just kidding… maybe).

name: C# Socks
description: NullReferenceException not included. Perfect for LINQ-ing your toes in style.

name: Docker Astronaut Socks
description: Contain your smelly feet in style. Supports multi-layer insulation (just like your images).

name: Elasticsearch Socks
description: For when you need full-text search on your toes. Warning: May cause cluster headaches.

name: Git Socks
description: For those who love `git commit --amend` a little too much. Warning: May cause merge conflicts with sandals.

name: Go Lang Socks
description: Compiles faster than you can say 'Where are my generics?' Lightweight, just like Go routines.

name: JavaScript Socks
description: Works equally well on frontend and backend feet. NaN% chance of disappointment!

name: Kubernetes Socks
description: Orchestrate your toes in style. Now with 100% less YAML frustration (socks only, actual K8s not included).

name: MongoDB Socks
description: NoSQL for your feet. Schemaless, just like your weekend coding projects.

name: Node.js Socks
description: Single-threaded but double-layered for maximum comfort. Callback hell not included.

name: Python Socks (Ronchi Edition)
description: Indentation errors now possible on your feet. Finally, whitespace that matters!

name: React Socks
description: Because your feet deserve a virtual DOM too. Now with hooks (but not the smelly kind).

name: TypeScript Socks
description: All the JavaScript fun, but with type-safe toes. No more `any` foot odor!

name: Vue.js Socks
description: Reactive, composable, and just as easy to put on as Vue is to learn.

name: 404 Socks Not Found
description: For when your feet disappear into the void. Just like your missing semicolon.

name: Open Source Socks
description: Like your last side project - free to acquire but costs your dignity to wear in public

name: PHP Socks
description: They inexplicably still work after 15 years, just like PHP itself. Warning: May randomly reindex your toes

name: PostgreSQL Socks
description: ACID-compliant foot comfort. Transactions roll back if you step in dog poop

name: Python Saffron Socks
description: Guaranteed to indent your toes properly. Warning: GIL may cause cold feet

name: R Language Socks
description: For when you need to run lm(toes ~ comfort) on your footwear

name: React Sky Blue Socks
description: Now with React Server Components - one sock always stays on the server

name: Scrum Socks
description: Perfect for sprinting to the fridge. Now with 20% more story points!

name: SQL Socks
description: SELECT * FROM socks WHERE comfort > 5. Warning: May cause N+1 toe problems

name: TensorFlow Socks
description: Your feet will love these 2D convolutional layers. Now with 100% more gradient descent

name: TypeScript Denim Socks
description: All the JavaScript comfort with type-safe toes. No more 'any' foot odor!

name: UI/UX Socks
description: Beautiful to look at but inexplicably uncomfortable - just like your last design system

name: Visual Studio Socks
description: Weighs 5lbs and takes 10 minutes to put on, just like the IDE

name: Vue Green Socks
description: The progressive sock framework - easy to put on but somehow still opinionated
